item.title: kerala-guliga
item.description: I’d like to share today why I personally loved #Kantara, though I thought it could have been slightly shorter. My mom has a small piece of land in Kerala and it has a divine stone structure of the Guligan there. 4-5 generations ago mom’s ancestors consecrated it there. Mom says she heard from her granny that when she was a kid, the stone was found on a tree, it has been there ever since.
